title: Tarar extends heartfelt sympathies to Chairman Punjab Group over sisterâ€™s death
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP): Federal Minister for Information and Broadcasting, Attaullah Tarar, on Thursday expressed his profound grief and sorrow over the passing of the sister of Mian Amer Mehmood, Chairman of the Punjab Group and Dunya News Network.
In a heartfelt condolence message, the minister extended heartfelt sympathies and deepest condolences to Mian Amer Mehmood and the bereaved family.
He conveyed his solidarity, stating that he stands with the family in their time of profound loss. The minister prayed to Almighty Allah to grant the departed soul eternal peace and the highest abode in Jannah, while bestowing upon the grieving family the patience and fortitude to bear this immense loss.
